Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Seekerus
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights and found it a really relaxing place to stay after a day of sight-seeing. A good breakfast always help start the day on good foot and this hotel provided that. Getting around the city was very easy from here with the U Barne being very close. Very helpful English speaking staff.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely worth your money”
Reviews.Author: MManly
Reviews.Content: We went to this hotel on a business trip for the third time in three years and never were dissatisfied. The hotel has very nice and clean rooms, free wi-fi everywhere. It is right on the U-Bahn, close to shops and malls in Neukölln, not far from the city center, has a free private car parking. Just remember to buy Environmental badge if you travel by car. The breakfast in this hotel is just great (variety, freshness...), even better than in many 4star+ hotels. There is no restaurant in the hotel but you can choose from many just next door.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel!”
Reviews.Author: kathiejmie
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed in this hotel for four nights. The room was spacious and very clean. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The hotel offers complimentary wi-fi and breakfast (which is absolutely fantastic!). The hotel is about 2-3 minutes walk from an u-bahn station and it doesn't take very long to get to the centre of the city from there. Also, there's a huge shopping center near the u-bahn station and lots of bars and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel OK, but greedy management.”
Reviews.Author: BizTraveler380
Reviews.Content: Management charges a 80% penalty if check out early. This is absolutely unacceptable for business travelers.

Reviews.Title: “Very good price/offer/position”
Reviews.Author: alvisepraha
Reviews.Content: we stayed 1 night in this hotel, very good. The room wasclear simple quite big, the peronal was frindly and professional, there is free car parking in the place, breakfast is luxury . The position is very good, 15 minutes by bus (number 29) to Check Point Charlie, just near the metro station. Nice and lively district.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location for public transport”
Reviews.Author: Ystrady
Reviews.Content: The hotel was comfortable and clean. Staff were very helpful. Stayed B & B. The breakfast was excellent. The location of the hotel was good. It was near bus stops and metro station and also near a good department store Karstadt. Direct bus from airport stops just around the corner from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “An ideal place to stay when visiting Berlin”
Reviews.Author: WilberEngland
Reviews.Content: The proximity of the hotel to transport links made it possible to visit all areas we hoped to see during our 5 day break to Berlin. The hotel appeared to be higher than a 3 star rating and in terms of service was one of the best we have visited. All the staff were helpful and pleasant and the buffet breakfasts were excellent!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Service”
Reviews.Author: traveltobrussels
Reviews.Content: This is perhaps a 2- or 3-star hotel, judged from UK standard. The room was spacious but no frills. But staff were all kind and you will receive a good hospitality. We could check in at 8:30 am. They kindly let us print out some stuffs from their computer without charge. There was free bottled water in the room. Breakfast was above 3-star hotel average. Free WiFi. Every small things made us happy during our stay. If you do not have to stay in very central, or are not looking for something fashionable, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for the money”
Reviews.Author: manitu_hu
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 of us with my colleagues, and as a start-up company we looked for a not expensive but decent hotel. We stayed for 189 euro 3 of us in the room for 2 nights - so with about 30 euro each per night we ended up. For that it was an excellent value: clean, quite, breakfast is good, receptionists are friendly. It had services and look as a 3-4 star hotel, for which we usually pay 80-120 euro in Germany each - without the extras. Surely would stay there again if in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: Baltiman
Reviews.Content: Cannot praise highly enough. Unbeatable value for Berlin, spotless, quiet, very friendly and helpful staff, good transport links 50 yards away, airport bus stops round corner. Good breakfast, no restaurant but plenty of places to eat with 100 yards.

Reviews.Title: “Good little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Justraveling
Reviews.Content: The Ludwig van Beethoven is a great hotel for those on a budget, yet wanting something clean and suitable for couples or families. We had a triple room, a really good size, small bathroom but separate toilet, so made it easier. The room was quite warm because of the afternoon sun, we asked for a fan, it was delivered to the room without any fuss. The breakfast is probably one of the best we've had at a similar three star hotel in Europe - great variety including cereals, fresh fruit and pastries, all served in a bright, airy room overlooking a pretty coutyard. The staff were really helpful with giving directions, suggestions for restaurants, etc. There is a wonderful Vietnamese restaurant just a few doors away, don't miss it, also a good Greek restaurant nearby. The subway and buses are really close to the hotel, it takes a while to get to the city but it's a nice experience by bus, you get to see so much of the suburbs. There are supermarkets and cafes all within a few hundred metres of the hotel. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is happy to be a little bit away from the sights, but wants a clean, comfortable experience.

Reviews.Title: “loved it- great bargain, location, staff, breakfast”
Reviews.Author: marvinToronto
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel near the Hermannplaz U bahn station. It is quite some distance from city centre but the train system is so good that it is not a problem getting around. There is a Karstadt dept store on the corner and banks with ATMS. Also food kiosks on the street for currywurst, fries etc. the hotel room was a good size with full bath. The TV was all German except for CNN but the reception was not good for it so I used my Ipod and speaker system for music. The room faced a busy street but I did not notice any noise as I live next to a major highway. They do have rooms facing the garden. There were no black out drapes so when the sun came up I woke up. The staff were wonderful at giving advice, arranging for my taxi to take me to the airport and coffee to get me going at 3am. the breakfast was EXCELLENT with a wide choice of breads, cereals, cheeses, cold cuts, fruit, juices, coffee, tea, yogurt. with such a good start to the day I needed very little lunch to tide me over to dinner. there are some great restaurants nearby- next door an Egyptian with calamari to die for. The german restaurant on the next corner had great schnitzel. an excellent hotel in a major city at a very good price, great service and breakfast too. What more do you need?

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stays”
Reviews.Author: chrisdf
Reviews.Content: I have stayed comfortably several times at this hotel. Karstadt Departmant store is very nearby where amongst other things one can get good inexpensive meals and a view from the excellent roof top self service restaurant.

HotelInfo.Name: Ludwig Van Beethoven Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Hasenheide 14, 10967 Berlin, Germany
